item.title: SWN
item.description: score:182 Chances: Higher institutional ownership indicates stock price sensitivity to institutional trading activity. Higher oil production and reduction in marketing purchases contributed to positive Q4 earnings. The longer-term bull case for natural gas is based on expanding U.S. exports, benefiting companies like Southwestern Energy.
